name: Curse of the Assassin
description: Fight, outwit and explore in Orlandes City as you uncover a conspiracy in this Gamebook Adventure where YOU control the story!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 2 GHz dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory Storage: 350 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with 1GB memory Storage: 350 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This book is a sequel to An Assasin in Orlandes and though it is not neccesary to have played that book there are several references back to it if you have. I got quite badly stuck at the end fight in this one and had to completely restart again in order to rectify the problem. You are going to need a companion to help you out so when the option comes the first time I recommend going for Esplanadian as he is the easiest to get first time through.  That hiccup aside though this is a solidy written adventure wtih a variety of paths through depending on what companions you get. I recommend trying for the other two after finishing the game once with Esplanadian.
